question: Charu Shila Devi was associated with which of the following incidents?
explanation: Charu Shila Devi is known to have inspired Khudi Ram Bose and other Bengali revolutionaries by puting a “Tilak of Blood” on thier foerheads. She was involved in the ‘Muzzafarpur Bomb Case’ in 1908. She took part in Salt Satyagraha of 1930 and Civil Disobedience Movement 1932 and was sent to jail for both the terms. She was once again arrested in connection with murder of Midnapore Magistrate.
